author: prasad
msg: * needs openejb-itests-core jars to be deployed.
* tests fail. They have to be fixed in openejb2/itests.

author: ngn
msg: Adding project for performance tests. These do not fit into the regular unit tests as they might take a long time and sometimes manual intervention to complete. Also note that they open a lot of sockets and you might have to wait for TIME_WAIT sockets to timeout before you can repeat a test run.

author: amol
msg: removed use of deprecated calls to get the String value of a cell
